mapper.insert:
insert into enterprise_master_data.company_staff(pcompany_staff_no, company_staff_name, company_staff_phone, short_name, role_id, department_id, enable_status, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.pcompanyStaffNo}, #{entity.companyStaffName}, #{entity.companyStaffPhone}, #{entity.shortName}, #{entity.roleId}, #{entity.departmentId}, #{entity.enableStatus}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into enterprise_master_data.company_staff(pcompany_staff_no, company_staff_name, company_staff_phone, short_name, role_id, department_id, enable_status, remark_info, deleted, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.pcompanyStaffNo}, #{entity.companyStaffName}, #{entity.companyStaffPhone}, #{entity.shortName}, #{entity.roleId}, #{entity.departmentId}, #{entity.enableStatus}, #{entity.remarkInfo}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update pcompany_staff_no = values(pcompany_staff_no) , company_staff_name = values(company_staff_name) , company_staff_phone = values(company_staff_phone) , short_name = values(short_name) , role_id = values(role_id) , department_id = values(department_id) , enable_status = values(enable_status) , remark_info = values(remark_info) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time)
